cause.description:
Egypt has been the crib of civilizations through history, but unfortunately now it is a place where no civil rights is kept. As an Egyptian and a Muslim i am inviting all of you to make Egypt a better place, by simply having ethics and being civilized in our daily interaction.
* Please no political arguments are to be posted as it kills the constructive and healthy discussion environment, Better Egypt is a place to discuss ways to improve Egypt with or without the government.
** Members are welcome to give ideas to improve Egypt in all fields should it be technical or social or whatever.
Note: Since this cause does not need financial funds, all donations are directed to "United Palestinian Appeal Inc".
Disclaimer : UPA is a humanitarian non-political organization with a mission to alleviate the suffering of Palestinians. United Palestinian Appeal does not endorse this cause and is in no way responsible for its content.
1. Everybody should be polite.
2. Egyptian Muslims and Christians are equal.
3. All of us should have ethics even in small things like traffic and driving
4. We should all work to get Egypt into a better place
cause.mission: Make Egypt a better place to live
cause.name: Better Egypt
